thread.title: Breaking Down The Captain America: Secret Empire Teasers
thread.title_full: Breaking Down The Captain America: Secret Empire Teasers

author: Jamie Lovett
title: Breaking Down The Captain America: Secret Empire Teasers
text:
Breaking Down The Captain America: Secret Empire Teasers Jamie Lovett Start Slideshow Slide of 
This week, Marvel Comics released a series of teasers hinting at an upcoming spring 2017 "Secret Empire" storyline. 
The teasers began with a simple text logo that included Steve Rogers' Captain America shield at the center. That's enough to assume that the storyline will feature Rogers as a central character. 
However, as more and more teasers were released with cryptic messages a pattern was found. Each teaser included a keyword that seemed to reference another Marvel Comics character or series. 
Perhaps by looking closely at each teaser it is possible to discern just where fans should be looking for additional clues and how far the reach of the Secret Empire really is.
